    • Constructor Detail

      • GameConfiguration

        public GameConfiguration(int nbRows,
                         int nbColumns,
                         int spriteSize,
                         int nbLives)
        Constructor with parameterisable size. Create a new GameConfiguration with the specified parameters. If 0 is specified as one of the parameter, the constructor uses the default value for this parameter.
        Parameters:
        nbRows - The number of rows of the window (default value: ).
        nbColumns - The number of columns of the window (default value: ).
        spriteSize - The size of the sprites displayed (default value: ).
        nbLives - The number of lives of the player (default value: ).
